DOC.brief_summary: The FC-7 study design open label , single arm , Phase I/II dose-escalation study evaluate combination neratinib cetuximab patient metastatic colorectal cancer primary tumor `` quadruple wild-type `` ( wild-type KRAS , NRAS , BRAF , PIK3CA ) . The primary aim Phase I portion study determine safety tolerability two-drug combination . The primary aim Phase II part determine overall objective response rate ( complete partial response ) Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST 1.1 ) . Patients receive concurrent therapy cetuximab ( 400 mg/m2 IV load dose follow 250 mg/m2 IV weekly ) , neratinib .
